name: Guess The Password
description:
Try to remember your passwords. These are yours, right? 

Guess the Password is a short, weird, little game I made to flex some C# muscles. You have a username, a login photo, and if you type in the wrong answer: a hint. The music is an original track, and the images used are royalty-free stock photos taken from Pexels.com. Good luck!

Controls:

  • [Tab] to Zoom
  • Use your Keyboard to type
  • [Enter/Return/Hover and Mouseclick] to Submit

I'd like to make a more complex version of this kind of idea someday; something with varied environents, as well as interactable clues  (papers/objects/photos) the player can sift through in order to glean information.
